data.title: Suresh Sambandam on LinkedIn: The story behind the name Kissflow
data.meta_description: The story behind the name Kissflow
data.text: I am so happy that the #Kanavu Series from Dream Tamilnadu achieved the massive milestone of 150 articles on the Vikatan platforms. The kanavu series is an attempt to identify product opportunities in all the districts of tamilnadu and build inclusive development. You can read all the Kanavu Articles here: https://lnkd.in/gi9euCbZ and you can see the Kanavu Videos here : https://lnkd.in/guXGU2ZK (only 13 districts are there now balance 25 districts recordings done and will be posted in the next few months one after another)
